---

**Government Tender Announcement: Shared Services Canada - Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)**

**References:**

* Contracting Authority:** Julie Bampton [julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.bampton) | 613-790-5915
* File Number:** PW-22-01005145
* Solicitation Number:** R000120569
* Closing Date:** 2022-09-01T00:00:00
* Notice URL: None

**Procurement Information:**

Shared Services Canada invites experienced IT service providers to submit proposals for the provision of Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) - Tier 2 - Programmer Analysts. This requirement is open only to those TBIPS EN578-170432 Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region.

**Contract Requirements:**

* Duration: 1 year, plus 2 option periods of 1 year each
* Security Level: Secret
* Services to be Provided: Programmer Analysts (Senior, Intermediate, and Junior)
* Incumbent: Kyndryl Canada Limited (Contract Award: October 1, 2019; Current Contract Value: $9,595,112.50; Contract End Date: October 31, 2023)

**Pre-qualified Suppliers:**

The following Tier 2 SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

[List of pre-qualified suppliers has been omitted for brevity]

**Proposal Submission:**

Proposal documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the pre-qualified Supply Arrangement Holders. Bidders are advised that "Buyandsell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

**Requirements and Conditions:**

* Proposal submissions must be in English or French.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year.

**Contact Information:**

For inquiries regarding this RFP, kindly contact Julie Bampton at [julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca) | 613-790-5915.
